pound.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

karate-chop.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

mega-punch.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

pay-day.effect: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.

fire-punch.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

ice-punch.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

thunder-punch.effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

scratch.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

vice-grip.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

razor-wind.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

swords-dance.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages.

cut.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

gust.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

wing-attack.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

whirlwind.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

fly.effect: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

bind.effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

slam.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

vine-whip.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

stomp.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

mega-kick.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

jump-kick.effect: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.

rolling-kick.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

sand-attack.effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

headbutt.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

horn-attack.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

tackle.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

body-slam.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

wrap.effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

take-down.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

thrash.effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

double-edge.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

tail-whip.effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.

poison-sting.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

twineedle.effect: Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.

leer.effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.

bite.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

growl.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

roar.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

disable.effect: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.

acid.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

ember.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flamethrower.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

mist.effect: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

water-gun.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

hydro-pump.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

surf.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

ice-beam.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

blizzard.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

psybeam.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

bubble-beam.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

aurora-beam.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.

hyper-beam.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

peck.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

drill-peck.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

submission.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

low-kick.effect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

counter.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

seismic-toss.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

strength.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

absorb.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

mega-drain.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

leech-seed.effect: Seeds the target, stealing HP from it every turn.

growth.effect: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage.

razor-leaf.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

solar-beam.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

petal-dance.effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

string-shot.effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

fire-spin.effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

thunder-shock.effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

thunderbolt.effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

thunder.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

rock-throw.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

earthquake.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

dig.effect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

toxic.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

confusion.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

psychic.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

meditate.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.

agility.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.

quick-attack.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

rage.effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

teleport.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  No effect otherwise.

night-shade.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

mimic.effect: Copies the target’s last used move.

screech.effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by two stages.

double-team.effect: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.

recover.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

harden.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.

minimize.effect: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.

smokescreen.effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

withdraw.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.

defense-curl.effect: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

barrier.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.

light-screen.effect: Reduces damage from special attacks by 50% for five turns.

haze.effect: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.

reflect.effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

focus-energy.effect: Increases the user’s chance to score a critical hit.

bide.effect: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

metronome.effect: Randomly selects and uses any move in the game.

mirror-move.effect: Uses the target’s last used move.

egg-bomb.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

lick.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

smog.effect: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.

sludge.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

bone-club.effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

fire-blast.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

waterfall.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

clamp.effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

skull-bash.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

constrict.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

amnesia.effect: Raises the user’s Special Defense by two stages.

kinesis.effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

soft-boiled.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

high-jump-kick.effect: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.

dream-eater.effect: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

leech-life.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

sky-attack.effect: User charges for one turn before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

transform.effect: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.

bubble.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

dizzy-punch.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

flash.effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

psywave.effect: Inflicts damage between 50% and 150% of the user’s level.

acid-armor.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.

crabhammer.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

rest.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

rock-slide.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

hyper-fang.effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

sharpen.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.

conversion.effect: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.

tri-attack.effect: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

super-fang.effect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.

slash.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

substitute.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user’s max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

struggle.effect: User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil.
